strIntroduction: Do you want to know the coolest place to welcome 2017's first light of dawn? Of course, it's at Hualien's Qixing Lake! Among the deep blue waters and the pristine coastline, welcome the morning sun with a beautiful, rocky seaside backdrop. On top of it, all the air force will be flying F-16 fighter jets, right over Qixing Lake, at crack of dawn. Catch the awe-inspiring site of fighter jets approaching from the Pacific, soaring over Qixing Lake and flying along the coast. Every year the most out of the extreme and unique way to welcome the first rays of the new year is at Qixing Lake in Hualien!
strTitle: 【Bring in the New Year with F-16 Fighter Jets】Welcome the dawn of 2017 at Hualien's Qixing Lake

strIntroduction: The most beautiful sunset is Taiwan is known to shine over the Gaomei Wetlands. The wind farms seem like an array of windmills set amidst the Wetlands, whose beautiful sunsets seem like they are right out of a Gauguin painting. It is an immensely pleasing experience and couples inevitably find it to be unforgettable! Tours are available daily! ！
strTitle: Half Day Trip to Taichung Gaomei Wetland

strIntroduction: Sun Moon Lake is the must visit scenic site in Taiwan, you will stop at every angle of the lake to admire its beautiful scenary, in this tour we will take you on a boat ride, a bicycle tour around the lake and a cable car ride to enjoy the beauty of Sun Moon Lake enabling you to deeply understand and admire Sun Moon Lake in all its angles and scopes.

strIntroduction: When you come to Wulai for hot springs, outdoor hot spring is a great place to go besides private bathhouses. Volando Spring Spa & Resort provides complete outdoor hot spring facilities including SPA pool, sauna & steam rooms for our guests. Outdoor hot spring allows you to enjoy the beautiful view while emerged in the healing pools. Finally, heal your stomach too with great cuisine. Come for a trip to the hot springs!

strIntroduction: The National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium offers a unique sleepover experience. You can explore the Aquarium behind the scenes, allowing guests of all ages to interact with the marine life. It is an experience completely unlike interaction during the daytime. There are many activities, and you will surely leave with unforgettable memories. So hurry and select the area you most want to sleepover in, if you don’t hurry you miss the limited opportunity...

strIntroduction: Enjoy the mountain peaks surrounded with the rosy red sun at dusk amidst the sea of clouds, as you encounter Alishan’s mysterious and mystical Giant Tree Plank Trail, where you will feel just how tiny humanity seems compared to Mother Nature’s grandeur. Enjoy your trip with our professional Tour Guide through this amazing forest path.
strTitle: Day Tour around Alishan Forest Railway and Giant Tree Plank Trail.

strIntroduction: There are many spots worth visiting near greater Kaohsiung area. It might be a good idea to charter a shuttle for a day so you can visit all the sites in one go. You could visit the Great Buddha at Fo Guang Shan Monastery, have some delicious vermicelli at Meinong, get some fresh seafood at Qijin, watch the sunset from Sizihwan Bay, and finally end the day at Ruifeng or Liuohe Nightmarket. A full day's worth of fun and experience around Kaohsiung on a chartered shuttle!
strTitle: Chartered Tour to Suburbs of Kaohsiung

strIntroduction: The first cultural tea house in Jiufen brings the culture of tea into the village and started a trend of people coming to Jiufen for tea and relaxation. The tea house is hosted inside a hundred year old building. The building is vibrant with life and energy. With its high beam structure and a patio, the building is full of life and warm sunlight. With rain being the norm in Jiufen, why not walk inside the tea house, enjoy the warmth radiating out from the stoves and sip tea and enjoy the peace and quiet there?
strTitle: Experience Taiwanese Tea Culture in Jiufen Tea House

strIntroduction: No visit to Kenting would be complete without experiencing the relaxing atmosphere of South Bay. Enjoy the white sands, blue sea and sky, and colorful sunshades dotted all around with people in bikinis and trunks paddling in the water or just strolling around the streets.
strTitle: Water sports experience in South Bay, Kenting.Free shuttle service provided from Kenting Main Street.

strIntroduction: Taitung's hot air balloon experience gives you the choice of going up in a moored (anchored) hot air ballon or the freedom of flight (Free-Flight) which will not only allow you to fly like a bird but will also give you a 360 degree "birds eye" view of Taitung's Valleys, allowing you to enjoy Taitung's beautiful, bright and colorful sunrises. This dreamlike journey is sure to be a once in a lifetime experience.

strIntroduction: This 10 hour Taipei charter tour Gives you even more! Survey the north coast on this incomparable bus tour. Visit Wan Li Jade Bay, Queens Head Rock and other geological sites in Ye Liu. Stop at great photo opportunities like the rock groves in Shimen (at Lao Mei Shi Cao) and of course "Green Bay" where you can get fresh seafood at set prices. And let's not forget a visit to the North Coast Cafe For a relaxing "tea time" while you enjoy the coastal scenery. Coming to Taipei doesn't mean you have to be in a rush. This bus tour gives you 10 hours of sites at a leisurely pace.
strTitle: 10-hour Chartered Taipei Day Tour

strIntroduction: MangoChaCha, the must-eat mango ice in Taiwan! Get all the top year round natural fresh Taiwan Irwin Mangoes you want! High in sweetness and full of fresh aroma, one bite of this delicate fruit and you will be totally captivated. This Korean pop stars' favorite fruit in Taiwan is something not to be missed!
strTitle: MangoChaCha Mango Ice Set

strIntroduction: As Taiwan’s Northeastern coastline comes into view enjoy the blue sky and picturesque white clouds, as you take in the special Nanyaqiyan rock formation with its weathering and marine abrasion formed geological landscape of Bitoujiao, and experience all the Northeast corner’s beautiful scenery along the coastline, as you chase the ocean breeze!
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to North-east Taiwan

strIntroduction: How can you miss skin diving if you come to Kenting? Look at the colorful underwater seaworld of Kenting, even if you don't know how to swim, just put on the skin diving gear, follow our instructor's orders, and you can easily relax and explore the beautiful seaworld of Kenting.

strIntroduction: 走訪臺灣保存最完整的古代城池 恆春古城，再到車城著名的四重溪溫泉，享受「美人湯」的洗禮，此地溫泉為碳酸泉水清澈無臭，可飲可浴，含有多種礦物質，對於皮膚有特別的療效，洗淨您一身疲憊煩憂。
strTitle: Half-day tour to Hengchun Old Town and Hot Spring

strIntroduction: Taiwan's North-Eastern coastline is renowned for its special geological landscape and renowned for its rich cultural history. Driving along the coastal road, you can see the jagged rock formations as you listen to the sound of the waves crashing against them. Enjoy the beautiful views of sea and skies and be charmed by small town vibes while reminiscing the traditions, culture and history of Jiufen, Jinguashi.
strTitle: Classic Jiufen and North-eastern Coast Day Tour

strIntroduction: Enjoy sunset? Alternative to Tamsui Fisherman's Wharf, the beaches in Shalun is another superb location to observe sunsets. Here, we have professional staff taking you out on a horseback stroll on the beach as you enjoy the sun setting into the Tamsui river and the gentle sea breeze. This is a great spot for couples, families, and friends to experience.

strIntroduction: Ever woken up by horse neigh? Or enjoying a cup of coffee to the sound of horses trotting around you? Lu Ye Equestrian Culture and Creative Park in Tamsui now lets you sleep over by the equestrian center next to the beach!

strIntroduction: A place not to be missed when in the vicinity of Taipei — welcome to the fantastic wonderland of Thousand Island Lake. Its name was derived from Qiandao Lake in Mainland China. The area was formed by the surrounding Feitsui Reservoir and Beishi River, giving it the impression of many mountains when looking down from the Yong'an Mountain Trail. Bays of green waters are nestled among the luscious and serene mountains while the Ba Gua Tea Garden beckons visitors over. Thousand Island Lake has everything you’d want in a vacation in Taiwan!
strTitle: Shiding Thousand Island Lake, Ba Gua tea Garden and Shiding Old Street 1-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Are you still waiting for airport bus? Are you still carrying your luggage to transfer? Make reservations of "KKday airport pick-up service" at once. Professional drivers take you to the appointed location, cozy and fast.

strIntroduction: This two-day, one-night itinerary, is a relaxing journey in which you can leisurely cycle through the beautiful, mountainous scenery. Climb to the heights of Luyeh in Gaotai county, crisscrossing through paths on the endless plains with unending views of rice paddies and tea plantations. Come back to the hot springs hotel spa in the evening to enjoy a soak in the unique hot "carbonic beauty" spring.
strTitle: 2-Day Tour at the Chihpen Hot Springs in Taitung

strIntroduction: Mukumugi in Hualien has been called lost paradise. This preservation area can only be reached on foot. A round trip takes 2.5 to 3 hours. Enjoy a walk with views of the crystal clear river and beautiful forest scenery. There are a few restaurants with aboriginal cuisine along the way for you to enjoy. Finally, you will reach Mugua River and Clear Water River with amazing clear water. Enjoy the paradise in Hualien!
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Mukumugi, Hualien

strIntroduction: Stand atop Taiwan’s location nearest to the sun, and welcome the sunrise! From Hehuan Mountain take in views of Taroko and the Cingjing Veterans Farm, with its incredibly beautiful views and wonderful, clean mountain air! Enjoy your unforgettable itinerary with KKday today!
strTitle: Hehuan Mountain Sunrise Tour

strIntroduction: Tainan was Taiwan's first area to be developed and the entire city has the look and feel of a bygone era, giving it an enchanting flavor. And as the saying goes, like a fine wine "it only gets better with age." Today Tainan is home to the new Chimei Museum as well as to the oldest tile paved salt fields. But this fusion of old with new isn't a conflict at all. If you can't get to Tainan via your own transpotation, why not take a chartered vehicle? In one day you'll get a taste of the most delicious delicacies and the best scenery Tainan has to offer.
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Day Tour in Tainan

strIntroduction: Experience Paragliding at Puli, Nantou County, enjoy paragliding in the sky of Puli, taking in the view of mountain ranges before you and feel the winds as you soar in the sky, look below you to see the beautiful landscape of Puli, you wouldn't want to touch the ground after this wondrous experience.
strTitle: Experience Paragliding at Puli, Nantou County

strIntroduction: If you only want spiciness from your spicy hot pot, then you are behind the times! Different than other spicy hot pots in the past, which emphasized only the spiciness, Red 99 reinterpreted spicy hot pot by emphasizing the tingling sensation and the individual hot pot. This combination creates a brand new spicy hot pot experience for each individual guest.
strTitle: Red99 Mala Hot Pot with Set Meal for 1

strIntroduction: Along with experienced and humorous leader explore private attractions of Hualien. Let's make the laughter everywhere in the valleys. It's a great adventures for 35 pax friends and families.
strTitle: The Adventure of River Trekking in Hualien

strIntroduction: In the sparkling summer at Green Island, you can see tourists in Tee shirts and shorts exploring this island under the tropical sun, many others get on a scooter and explore the island riding through mountains and along the sea, let's go for a skin diving, hot spring and sunrise watching experience with this exciting tour.
strTitle: Green Island Skin Diving 2-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: 玩高雄好方便，旗津夕陽、六合夜市一次玩透透！還有四小時速遊方案，讓忙碌的人也可以稍微放鬆一下！
strTitle: Chartered Tour to Kaohsiung City

strIntroduction: You can choose your own visiting sites in Kenting with a chartered vehicle, or you can follow the recommended tour sites, it takes approximately two days to cover all scenic areas in Kenting, travelling either from the north or south of Kenting to Kenting Street, if you have no idea how to begin your trip, our chartered driver have many sites they can share with you.
strTitle: 8-hour chartered Kenting day tour

strIntroduction: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain has become famous for its fields of lilies. Every year, from August to October, at an altitude of 800-1400 meters, this incredible bloom covers the mountain from top to bottom. Looking down from Wangyou Gorge the horizon is filled with a sea of golden flowers. This bloom happens once a year and is an absolute can not miss. You must make a vacation out of Taitung's spectacular Lily bloom.
strTitle: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain Half Day Charterd Tour

strIntroduction: 台南都會公園內的奇美博物館，來到這裡滂礡的建築宛如來到歐洲的博物館，藝術品多到值得花上一整天。
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Chimei Museum in Tainan

strIntroduction: A designated shuttle will take you directly from Cingjing Farm to Sun Moon Lake. You don’t have to worry about transportation, making it so much easier for you to get around central Taiwan.
strTitle: Cingjing to Sun Moon Lake shuttle service

strIntroduction: Experience scuba diving in Hou Bi Lake - Our professional instructors will scuba dive with you to explore the sea bottom, leave all your worries behind and enjoy this relaxing and wonderful moment as you are submerged in the ocean surrounded by water.
strTitle: Scuba Diving Experience in Houbihu, Kenting

strIntroduction: The peak season for observing autumn colors in Aowanda starts from the beginning of October until the end of December every year. Aowanda contains the largest maple forest in Taiwan, and is appropriately named "Home of maples". It is the most famous spot in autumn to check out the red maple leaves.
strTitle: Half Day Tour to Aowanda Forest Recreation Area from Cingjing

strIntroduction: The coolest thing you could do this summer is nothing but carrying an oxygen tank and diving into the colorful sea world of Green Island to discover all the magnificent and beautiful corals, fish, and shells that you've never seen. Apart from vast sea and blue sky, Green Island also has three world-class diving sites - Shih-lang, Chai-kou, and Dabaisha, and they will definitely leave you unforgettable memories once you come to see it by yourself.
strTitle: Green Island Discover Diving 3-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: Summer is the perfect time to visit eastern Taiwan. Come to Green Island, 50 minute away from Taitung, to see the clear and blue ocean, go for a nocturnal visit to find the wild Formosa Sika Deers, and enjoy an experience of world-famous salt-water hot spring. Moreover, you could ride bicycles through the field roads in Taitung, watching people paragliding in Luyah Gaotai, and in summer time, you could even see hot air balloons slowly rising up to the sky. A relaxing trip to eastern Taiwan is a must in the summer.
strTitle: 3-Day Package including Scuba Diving in Green Island and Chartered tour in Taitung

strIntroduction: Come experience the Pacific Ocean at Farglory Ocean Park in Hualien. Unlike other theme parks with mechanical rides, Farglory Ocean Park combines education and fun together and is perfect for families. 4 themed areas inside the park include dolphin and sea lion show, with mermaid performances and Broadway style acrobatic performances. Come and experience the ocean in Hualien!
strTitle: Day tour to Hualien Farglory Ocean Park including admission tickets

strIntroduction: Come tour Taiwan's ancient city of Tainan, with colonial architecture Sio House and Sihcao Green Tunnel, hailed as "Taiwan's Pocket Edition of the Amazon". Along the way, we will also be passing through Chi-Mei Museum and Anping Old Street. We will be exploring the specialty gourmets in Tainan while hitting all the must-see sites!
strTitle: 1-Day tour to Sio House and Anping Tree House of Tainan

strIntroduction: If you desire to directly travel to central Taiwan, and avoid the longer northern route, you can select either direction of the Hualien route which goes straight from Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns, to Wuling and Taroko Gorge, then direct to Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns or hotels. This allows you to enjoy all the sites of Taiwan’s highest elevation highway.
strTitle: 1-Day Tour around Hualien and Cingjing Across Taiwan's Highest Highway

strIntroduction: If you only have half a day in Taitung you can still have a great time! Visit the Waterfront Forest's International Landmark and art installations. Take a bike ride through Forest Park, then visit the musical enclave of Ironworks Village. These are Taitung's can't miss attractions.

strIntroduction: 前往墾丁的捷徑，班次多，價格便宜！ 是不開車的時候最安全又划算的交通工具。

strIntroduction: 暢遊臺南精華景點，包括府城古蹟、臺灣最大人工湖烏山頭水庫、以及全臺歷史建築票選第二名的新化老街。

strIntroduction: Departing from Taitung along route 9, riding north along the valleys, you will hit many scenic spots such as: Loyeh, Brown Avenue, Paradise Road. Along the way, take in the scenic valleys of lush green rice paddies. Ride your bicycle leisurely through the S-shaped country roads. Travel simply in Taitung for maximum relaxation.

strIntroduction: 高雄愛河為高雄夜晚必遊景點，搭上高雄愛之船，沿途欣賞華燈初上的高雄都市景觀，感受浪漫的遊河體驗，之後來到高雄六合夜市，多樣的小吃與海產店，以美食來感受高雄港都的特色吧！

strIntroduction: 尋找老城市的新面貌，巷弄內的大驚奇，讓充滿藝術氣息的藍曬圖導引你進入不一樣的台南。

strIntroduction: Rainbow grandpa's dream of a beautiful artistic style turns the entire small town into a colorful world. A literary and artistic trip that young hipsters cannot miss in Taichung.

strIntroduction: Apart from enjoying a hearty seafood feast, you can go skin diving too! You can experience all sorts of exciting and thrilling water activities. Kenting is definitely a spot where you should keep in mind! Spend an entire afternoon feasting on seafood and playing water activity in Houbihu. . .
strTitle: Skin Diving and Water Activity at Houbihu Kenting

strIntroduction: Visiting Orchid Island is like visiting an exotic foreign country. The locals still follow the old customs and way of life. They even keep a local calendar. The Orchid Island 4 Day and 3 Night Excursion will allow you to soak in the local culture of Orchid Island as you circumnavigate the island on a motor scooter, becoming immersed in the island and its natural beauty. This trip covers all your needs, from transportation, to lodging and special tours. It will surely be an unforgettable journey.
strTitle: 4 days 3 nights package tour in Orchid island

strIntroduction: Realize your highest dreams when you paraglide in Hualien. Enjoy a bird’s eye view of the entire East Rift Valley, as you soar into the sky and take in the beautiful skyline.
strTitle: Paragliding Experience in Hualien

strIntroduction: Lying on the luxurious green grassland with the gently brush of wind on your face, enjoy the view of Cing Jin Veterans Farm that was built like a European chateau with herds of sheep grazing and strolling lazily on the pasture, while looking at the overlapping moutain ranges and white clouds, chase and run around with the little sheep and don't forget to take pictures of this beautiful scenary and action, this is one of the most relaxing tour that you would definitely enjoy.
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Cingjing Farm from Taichung

strIntroduction: 沒去過亞馬遜河沒關係！現在亞馬遜河來臺灣摟～袖珍版亞馬遜叢林就在台南！“你還在等什麼？”趕快來KKday~
strTitle: One Day Tour at Tainan Coastal Ecology

strIntroduction: This is one of the trendiest water activities in Europe and America for the last three years, Hollywood superstar – Leonardo Dicaprio, international singer Rihanna are SUP players. SUP enables surfer to stand on board and paddling hand over hand, it is a highly safe activity and you can surf with ease whether you are on a river, lake or at sea as if you are walking on water.
strTitle: SUP Lesson in Kenting South Bay

strIntroduction: Cycling or even lying beneath the small leafed olive trees, along Tang road in Longtien Village (Luyeh, Taitung) is an experience you absolutely can not miss. Located along Luye/Gaotai's paragliding fields, Tang Road passes through a lush grassfield and is considered Longtien Village's most beautiful section. When you come to Taitung free yourself on the open road and look skyward, beneath the shady trees and get some some spiritual reprieve.
strTitle: Taitung Luye Longtien Village Cycling One Day Tour

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Hualian train station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Hualien Train Station

strIntroduction: Sun Moon Lake is Taiwan's largest and most prestigious freshwater attraction. This trip will take you on a tour of the lake and provide the opportunity to experience beautiful panoramic views by yacht and cable car.
strTitle: One Day Tour at Sun Moon Lake

strIntroduction: Cross the seacoast and mountain ranges on Yuchang Road, connecting Taitung's Dongchang township with Hualien's town of Yuli. Make what would normally take two and a half hours into a 30 minute trip, connecting the most beautiful scenery of Huadong Valley with the eastern seacoast. In one day you can cover all the scenic sites of Taitung!
strTitle: Taitung Yuzhang Road One Day Tour

strIntroduction: This brand new created Monster Village will take you on an illusive journey as though you have walked into the traditional land of Japan, this village built in Japanese style , the monsters are not scary at all, but cute and adorable, it is a fun place for adults and children.
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Xitou Monster Village in Nantou

strIntroduction: Traveling in Motor glider flight through the East Rift Valley in Hualien offers Taiwan's most spectacular aerial views of the natural landscape.
strTitle: Motor Glider Flight Experience in Hualien

strIntroduction: Go sea scuba diving! Our professional instructors will scuba dive with you to explore the sea bottom, forget all your worries and enjoy this relaxing and wonderful moment as you are surrounded by the ocean.
strTitle: Scuba Diving by Boat at Houbihu in Kenting

strIntroduction: Apart from common shore diving, you could also enjoy the relatively rare offshore deep sea diving to see more colorful fish and even Green Island's unique sea creature - pygmy seahorses. The wonderful view will definitely impress you.
strTitle: Offshore deep sea diving in Green Island (PADI certificate required)

strIntroduction: Due to Orchid Island's unique climate and environment (high temperatures and lots of rain and typhoons) as well as as it's reliance on its own resources, a unique dwelling has sprung from these factors "The Underground House." Upon arrival at Orchid Island a visit to The Underground House must be accompanied by either a professional tour guide or by a host. One cannot just go into The Underground House to take a peek or take pictures. If you want to experience this unique cultural landmark have a professional take you there to explore.
strTitle: 3 days 2 nights package tour in Orchid island

strIntroduction: Travellers can't get enough of Taiwan's "backyard gardens" in Taitung. Stroll leisurely along the eastern sea coast or take a walk on the Sanxian platform's sea bridge to take in the coastal scenery. Make your way to Donghu's Taiyuan Valley to get a look at the adorable Formosan Rock Monkeys. While you're at it take in the burgeoning art scene at cultural spots like the Dulan Sugar Refinery. Take it slow along Taitung's eastern seacoast and get a veiw beyond compare.
strTitle: Taitung Sanxiantai, Jialu Lan, Jinzun East Coast One Day Tour

strIntroduction: Taitung's North-South Valleys half day excursion will take you to the Gaotai Tea Plantation to get a view of Taitung's amazing beauty. Here you can also catch a glimpse of Huadong Valley off in the distance. You will get a taste of Dove Bars made from fresh Chulu milk. These delicious treas are made without a single drop of water added. In only half a day you'll be able to wander through the valleys of Taitung!
strTitle: Taitung Luye Gaotai Garden Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: Traveling to Hualien, you will definitely pass through SuHua highway, which is on the east coast of Taiwan. On this scenic highway ride, you can see the Pacific Ocean on one side, and the magnificent cliffs on the other. If you want to experience these beautiful sceneries, you can choose the Taipei-Hualien bus tour, which takes a different route from train rides, and enjoy the marvel of Hualien on the way.
strTitle: 1-Day Tour around Taipei, Jiufen and Hualien
